hero.title: The Soul of Scent
hero.subtitle: Experience an olfactory journey guided by neural intelligence and timeless craftsmanship.

story.title: Your Signature, AI-Refined.
story.subtitle: At Aura AI, we bypass the chaos of traditional counters. Our proprietary AI engine decodes your olfactory preferences through a series of emotional and environmental triggers.
story.feature1_desc: Digital sequencing of base chords and top note resonances.
story.feature2_desc: Projection optimized for your specific climate and social density.

membership.title: The Elite Circle
membership.subtitle: True luxury is a whisper, not a shout. Our exclusive membership offers a sanctuary for those who seek the truly bespoke.
membership.benefit1_desc: Monthly AI-crafted fragrances tailored to your evolving seasons and moods.
membership.benefit2_desc: Early access to extremely limited editions synthesized by guest master perfumers.
membership.benefit3_desc: 24/7 access to your personal AI scent consultant and bespoke layering guides.

discovery.title: The AI Discovery Process
discovery.step1_desc: Our AI analyzes 147 data points from your sensory preferences and lifestyle.
discovery.step2_desc: A unique molecular formula is generated, blending over 200 rare ingredients.
discovery.step3_desc: Hand-poured in Grasse, France, and shipped to your doorstep in obsidian glass.

quiz.title: Essence Discovery
quiz.subtitle: Allow our AI to decode your sensory preferences into a mathematical scent formula.
quiz.question: Which environment resonates with you most?

city.title: Nocturnal Urban
city.desc: Neon lights, cold rain, dark coffee

sea.title: Aegean Morning
sea.desc: Sea salt, citrus groves, warm stone

login.title: Enter the House
login.subtitle: Unlock your neural scent profile, manage your private collection, and access member-exclusive releases.

register.title: Craft Your Signature
register.subtitle: Join 50,000+ connoisseurs who have discovered their true olfactory identity through our AI synthesis.
register.page_subtitle: Create an account to preserve your private collection
register.terms_text: By creating an account, I agree to the

forgot_password.title: Retrieve Your Essence
forgot_password.subtitle: We will securely transmit a restoration link to your registered communication channel.
forgot_password.enter_email: Enter your digital identifier to proceed
forgot_password.check_email: Please check your transmission for instructions
forgot_password.link_sent: An encrypted link has been dispatched to
forgot_password.link_valid: It remains valid for a period of 60 minutes.

reset_password.title: Fortify Your Access
reset_password.subtitle: Define a new cryptographic signature to safeguard your private olfactory collection.
reset_password.portal_secured: Your portal is now secured with a new signature
reset_password.success_message: Your password has been successfully re-synthesized. You may now return to the portal to re-authenticate.

logout.title: Until the next Inspiration
logout.subtitle: You have been safely disconnected from the House
logout.quote: A journey of a thousand scents ends with a single memory.

perks.title: Elite Privileges
perks.desc: You have unlocked free expedited courier service for all future acquisitions.

footer.desc: A digital sanctuary for the senses. Where neural science encounters the heritage of Grasse.
footer.newsletter_desc: Be the first to explore limited drops and AI profile updates.
